# install once, then comment out
needs <- c("tidyverse","lubridate","patchwork")
to_install <- needs[!sapply(needs, requireNamespace, quietly = TRUE)]
if (length(to_install)) install.packages(to_install, dependencies = TRUE)

library(tidyverse); library(lubridate); library(patchwork)
set.seed(42)

n <- 240
df <- tibble(
  timestamp = as.POSIXct("2025-01-01 08:00:00", tz = "UTC") + minutes(0:(n-1)),
  temp_c    = 20 + sin(seq(0, 4*pi, length.out = n)) + rnorm(n, 0, 0.25),
  wind_ms   = pmax(0, rnorm(n, mean = 3, sd = 0.9))
)

p1 <- ggplot(df, aes(timestamp, temp_c)) + geom_line() +
  labs(title="Temperature vs Time", x=NULL, y="°C") + theme_minimal()

p2 <- ggplot(df, aes(wind_ms)) + geom_histogram(bins=30) +
  labs(title="Wind speed", x="m/s", y="count") + theme_minimal()

p3 <- ggplot(df, aes(wind_ms, temp_c)) + geom_point(alpha=.6) +
  geom_smooth(se=FALSE) + labs(title="Temp vs Wind", x="m/s", y="°C") + theme_minimal()

p1 | (p2 / p3)
